lines.text: Non-swimmers should never leap bare-assed into the sea of love. My dear, the sea of love is full of squid!
You have nice hair - it fits the mood of your butt.
It's medically impossible to kill anyone this way.
[In reference to the three girl's attic activities]
Go with me, Paxton Quigley, and I'll take you on a tour round the groovy little sub-culture of today's female
